verses.name: Mark 11:28
verses.text: And say unto him, By what authority doest thou these things? and who gave thee this authority to do these things?

verses.name: Mark 11:29
verses.text: And Jesus answered and said unto them, I will also ask of you one question, and answer me, and I will tell you by what authority I do these things.

verses.name: Mark 11:30
verses.text: The baptism of John, was it from heaven, or of men? answer me.

verses.name: Mark 11:31
verses.text: And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say, Why then did ye not believe him?
